abstract: Former Suffolk County Police Chief James Burke is sentenced to 46 months in federal prison for actions he took, including beating of man who stole bag containing pornography and sex toys from Burke's car and then covering up both robbery and incident; Burke's actions have led to wider investigation into corruption that is focused not just on police but also prosecutors and judiciary.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Suffolk County Police Chief Is Sentenced to 46 Months
headline.main: James Burke, Ex-Suffolk County Police Chief, Is Sentenced to 46 Months

snippet: Mr. Burke’s efforts to cover up the 2012 beating of a man who stole a bag belonging to him set in motion a scandal that has reverberated through Long Island politics....
